short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disposable email inbox in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imbox is a Chrome extension that gives you a disposable inbox inside your browser. It helps you manage your emails without cluttering your main inbox. Just open the extension, and you'll have a separate inbox where you can read, reply, or delete emails. When you're done, close the extension, and the inbox disappears. It's perfect for keeping your main inbox organized and free from spam.
